subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Sulley Muntari scored in the 90th minute to give host Ghana a 2-1 victory against Guinea in the opening match of the African Cup of Nations in Accra. Ghana, a four-time African champion, took the lead in the 54th minute on Asamoah Gyan’s penalty kick, but Guinea tied it in the 64th, when Oumar Kalabane scored.
